original_text: There will be loud wailing throughout Egypt—worse than there has ever been or ever will be again.
korean_text: 애굽 온 땅에 전무후무한 큰 부르짖음이 있으리라

sentences.original_text: There will be loud wailing throughout Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 애굽 온 땅에 큰 통곡이 있을 것이라

sentences.original_text: worse than there has ever been
sentences.korean_translation: 지금까지 있었던 것보다 더 심할 것이며
